lom:description.lom:string: "High school girls interested in pursuing studies in computer science and information technology are often faced with challenges. Because of the gender gap for women in computer science, girls entering the study can feel isolated or have difficulty finding inspiration among fellow women computer scientists. But for the University of Illinois Department of Computer Science, connecting high school girls with inspiring college role models is all about fun. The department's Games 4 Girls competition, now in its 3rd year, challenges college women to create video games that appeal to their high school counterparts."

lom:keyword.lom:string: community, technology, girls, graphics, computer science, information technology, games, role models, intervention

lom:title.lom:string: Games 4 Girls: Inspiring Women in Computer Science
